location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, at Bombay to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is responding to an enquiry made by the Bombay Government respecting the loss incurred by Ahmed Uzem [Aḥmad ‘Aẓīm], as a result of the capture of two of his boats by a British squadron attacking the Port of Mocka [Al-Mukhā].
